mapper.select: select * from (select BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, b.ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join member using(userid) UNION select b.BKNO BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, s.ENROLLDATE ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join SHAREBUCKET s on (b.bkNo = s.bkNo) join member m on (s.userid = m.userid)) order by ENROLLDATE desc
select BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, b.ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketlist b join member using(userid) where nickname = '관리자찡'

select * from (select BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, b.ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join member using(userid) UNION select b.BKNO BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, s.ENROLLDATE ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join SHAREBUCKET s on (b.bkNo = s.bkNo) join member m on (s.userid = m.userid)) order by bklike desc, ENROLLDATE desc
select * from company where approval = 'Y'
select * from media where coid is not null
select BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, b.ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join member using(userid) join cominbucket using(bkno) where COID = #{coId}
select * from media where bkno is not null

select * from (select USERID, USERPWD, USERNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH, GENDER, NICKNAME, CAUTION, PR_IMAGE, FW_COUNT, m.ENROLLDATE ENROLLDATE, STATUS from member m join sharebucket using(userid) where bkno = #{bkNo} UNION select USERID, USERPWD, USERNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH, GENDER, NICKNAME, CAUTION, PR_IMAGE, FW_COUNT, m.ENROLLDATE ENROLLDATE, STATUS from member m join bucketlist using(userid) where bkno = #{bkNo})
select BNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BLIKE, BCOUNT, b.ENROLLDATE, b.STATUS, NICKNAME, BKNO from board b join member using(userid) where bkno = #{bkNo} and NICKNAME = #{nickName}
select BNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BLIKE, BCOUNT, b.ENROLLDATE, b.STATUS, NICKNAME, BKNO from board b join member using(userid)
select * from member where userid != 'admin' and status = 'Y'
select * from bucketlist
select * from company join media using(coid)

select * from (select BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, b.ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join member using(userid) UNION select b.BKNO BKNO, BKNAME, BKCONTENT, TAG, s.ENROLLDATE ENROLLDATE, BKLIKE, nickname, COMPLETE, CATENUM from bucketList b join SHAREBUCKET s on (b.bkNo = s.bkNo) join member m on (s.userid = m.userid)) where TAG like '%' || #{t} || '%' order by ENROLLDATE desc
select * from company join media using(coid) where coname like '%' || #{c} || '%'
select * from company join cominbucket using(coid) where bkno = #{bkNo}
